attributes.action: end the tax / VAT of tobacco on the grounds that it's hypocritical.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to end the tax / VAT of tobacco on the grounds that it's hypocritical to make money from a product that kills thousands of people and has a government health warning.

Show your commitment to the public's health by deed as well as word, please.
